item.title: Mercedes Benz New Actros 2019 v2.2 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 10, 2025

Mercedes Benz New Actros 2019 v2.2 1.54 ETS2

Version 2.2 for 1.54
– change to ETS2 – 1.54

Version 2.1
– change to ETS2 – 1.53
– add Kast Rigid addon

Features:
– 5 cabins: StreamSpace 2,50, BigSpace , GigaSpace, Edition1, Edition 2
– Actros L Addon with own interiors, badges, headlights and Edition 3. Actuilly without new cams!
– 15 chassis variants: 11 chassis tractor
– 7 engine variants OM 471 / OM 471 – Mercedes drivetrain mod ready
– 6 gearbox variants – Mercedes drivetrain mod ready
– 6 Interior variants LHD + RHD: Basic, Style Line, Trend Line, Edition 1, Edition 2
– 40 original Mercedes colors + Safety Truck skin, Edition 1 skin, Edition 2 CharterWay skin + SCS Paintjobs ready
– SCS Mercedes Actros DLC Ready

Credits: Wolli2017

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Volvo FH Gustavim v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 9, 2025

Volvo FH Gustavim v1.0 ETS2

The “Volvo FH Gustavim ETS2” refers to a custom mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 that recreates a specific, highly customized Volvo FH truck, often associated with a real-life truck or a popular theme among Brazilian truckers. The “Gustavim” part likely refers to either the real-life owner/style inspiration for the truck, or a modder/editor named “Gustavim” or “Gustavo Mods” who created or heavily modified the truck.

Here’s what you can expect from such a mod:
Customized Volvo FH: This isn’t just a generic Volvo FH. It’s built to replicate a very specific look and feel, typically featuring:
“Arqueado” (Arched/Lowered) Suspension: This is a popular style in Brazil where the truck’s suspension is modified to give it a lowered or “arched” appearance.
Unique Paint Scheme and Decals: Often includes a custom paint job, specific logos, stickers, and possibly luminous signs (“letreiros”) that are characteristic of the “Gustavim” style.
Extensive Accessories: Expect a wealth of external accessories like custom lights, air horns, unique mudflaps, custom bumpers, side skirts, and sometimes even unique tire/wheel combinations.
Detailed Interior: The interior is usually heavily customized with specific upholstery, dashboard accessories (GPS, phones, drinks, etc.), and custom lighting.
Brazilian Influence: Given the “Gustavim” reference and the prevalence of “arqueado” trucks, this mod is almost certainly from a Brazilian modder and aims to replicate a specific aesthetic popular within the Brazilian trucking scene. It would be designed to fit well with Brazilian maps and other Brazilian truck/trailer mods.
Realism and Detail: Modders like “Gustavim” (or those associated with that style) are known for putting a high level of detail into their creations, striving for realistic 3D models, textures, and physics.

Credits: gustavo gomes

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: SCANIA SUPER v5.3 WSMODS v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 9, 2025

SCANIA SUPER v5.3 WSMODS v1.0 ETS2

“SCANIA SUPER v5.3 WSMODS ETS2” refers to a mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) that brings the Scania Super truck, likely an updated version of the new generation Scania, into the game, with WSMODS being the creator or brand behind it. The “v5.3” indicates a specific version or update of this mod.
Here’s what you can generally expect from a mod like this:
Scania Super Features (as a real truck and typically replicated in mods):
The Scania Super refers to Scania’s latest powertrain generation, featuring new 13-liter engines and a new gearbox range designed for enhanced fuel efficiency and performance. Key aspects often highlighted by Scania (and replicated in detailed mods) include:

New 13-liter Engines: These engines are designed for higher torque at lower RPMs, contributing to better fuel economy. They come in various horsepower options (e.g., 420 hp, 460 hp, 500 hp, 560 hp).
Improved Efficiency: Focus on reducing fuel consumption.
CRB (Compressed Release Brake): An enhanced auxiliary braking system offering significant braking power without relying solely on the Retarder, improving safety and reducing maintenance.
Robust Fuel Tanks: New D-shaped aluminum fuel tanks that are lighter and more robust, with features to optimize usable fuel volume.
New Multimedia System: Often a larger, more advanced infotainment system with integrated connectivity, Bluetooth, USB-C, Apple CarPlay, and Android Auto, also allowing control over vehicle functions like suspension, AC, and lights.
Active Cruise Control (ACC): Advanced cruise control systems for driver assistance.

WSMODS Specifics (for ETS2):
WSMODS is likely a modding group or individual that specializes in creating truck mods for ETS2. Their “Scania Super v5.3” would aim to incorporate the real-life features of the Scania Super into the game with a high level of detail.

High-Quality 3D Model: Expect a very detailed and accurate 3D model of both the exterior and interior of the Scania Super.
Realistic Sounds: Authentic engine sounds that match the new Scania Super engines, along with realistic air brake sounds, gear shifts, and other truck effects.
Extensive Customization: Typically, high-quality truck mods offer a wide range of customization options, including:
Multiple cabin configurations (Highline, S-cab, R-cab, etc.).
Various chassis options (4×2, 6×2, 6×4, 8×4, etc.).
Different engine and transmission options (including the new Super powertrains).
Interior customization (dashboard accessories, upholstery, steering wheels, lighting).
External accessories (lights, bull bars, side skirts, fenders, wheels, tires, paint jobs).
Compatibility: The mod would be designed to work with the latest versions of Euro Truck Simulator 2. Modders usually provide updates to ensure their mods remain compatible after game patches.

Credits: w3d

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MAN TGX 2010 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 9, 2025

MAN TGX 2010 v1.0 ETS2

The “MAN TGX 2010 ETS2” refers to a popular truck mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 that adds the 2010 model year of the MAN TGX heavy-duty truck to the game. While SCS Software (the developers of ETS2) have updated versions of the MAN TGX in the base game, many players prefer dedicated mods for specific models like the 2010 version due to their extensive features and customization options.
Here’s what you can typically expect from a well-made MAN TGX 2010 mod for ETS2.

Key Features (often seen in mods by creators like XBS, a known modder for this truck):
Detailed 3D Model: A highly accurate and detailed recreation of the MAN TGX 2010, both externally and internally. This includes realistic textures, proper scaling, and attention to smaller details.
Multiple Cabin Options: You’ll usually find various cabin types available, such as:
XL (standard)
XLX (larger with more headroom)
XXL (the largest, often with a flat floor)
Various Chassis Configurations: A wide range of chassis options to suit different preferences and cargo types, including:
4×2 (standard two-axle)
6×2 (with liftable or steerable axles)
6×4 (for heavy hauling)
8×4 (for extreme heavy loads)
BDF chassis (for rigid trucks with interchangeable bodies)
Engine and Transmission Options: A comprehensive selection of real-world MAN engine configurations (e.g., D20, D26 engines) with varying horsepower outputs, and a range of realistic transmission options (e.g., ZF TipMatic automated manual transmissions) with different gear ratios.
Extensive Customization: This is often a major draw for such mods. You can expect:
External Tuning Parts: Bull bars, roof bars, custom lights, lightboxes, air horns, various mirrors, mudguards, side skirts, exhaust pipes, etc.
Interior Customization: Options for different dashboard trims, upholstery, steering wheels, floor mats, and accessories like GPS, laptops, coffee makers, and other personal items (often compatible with the Cabin Accessories DLC).
Paint Jobs/Skins: Support for a wide variety of custom paint jobs and community-created skins.
Realistic Sounds: High-quality, authentic engine sounds, air brake sounds, horn, and other ambient truck noises that accurately reflect the MAN TGX 2010.
Compatibility: Designed to work with recent versions of Euro Truck Simulator 2. Modders typically update their trucks to ensure compatibility with new game patches. It often supports official DLCs like Cabin Accessories, Mighty Griffin Tuning Pack, etc.
Standalone: The truck is usually a standalone model, meaning it appears in the in-game truck dealer (often the MAN dealer) and doesn’t replace any default trucks.

Credits: menso

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania Plínio BAR.Brutos.Mods v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 9, 2025

Scania Plínio BAR.Brutos.Mods v1.0 ETS2

“Scania Plínio BAR.Brutos.Mods ETS2” refers to a highly customized Scania truck mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), created and maintained by a Brazilian modder or modding group known as “Plínio” or “BAR.Brutos.Mods”.
Here’s a breakdown of what that typically means:

Scania Truck: The base of the mod is a Scania truck, usually a modern “S” or “R” series, but it could also be an older generation.
“Plínio” / “BAR.Brutos.Mods”: This identifies the creator(s) of the mod. “Plínio” is a known Brazilian ETS2 modder, and “BAR.Brutos.Mods” likely refers to his modding collective or brand. They are highly regarded in the Brazilian ETS2 community for producing detailed and realistic truck mods with a distinctive Brazilian “qualificada” (qualified/customized) style.
Key Features (typical for this modder):
Extensive Customization: These mods are renowned for their incredible level of customization. This includes:
“Arqueado” (Arched/Lowered) Suspension: A very popular modification in Brazil, giving the truck a distinct lowered and often “arched” look.
Unique Paint Schemes and Decals: Often includes specific liveries, logos, and stickers that reflect Brazilian trucking culture.
Tons of Accessories: Expect a vast array of external accessories like custom lights, air horns, unique mudflaps, custom bumpers, side skirts, diverse wheel options (including chrome and custom rims), and exhaust pipes.
Detailed Interior: The interior is usually fully modeled and highly customizable with various upholstery options, dashboard accessories (GPS, cell phones, drinks, etc.), and custom interior lighting.
Exclusive Sounds: Often comes with authentic engine sounds, air brake sounds, and other effects that match real-life Scania trucks and modified Brazilian trucks.
Realistic Physics: The mod aims for realistic physics, especially concerning suspension behavior and weight distribution, to provide an immersive driving experience.
Regular Updates: Plínio/BAR.Brutos.Mods are known for frequently updating their mods to maintain compatibility with new versions of ETS2 (e.g., 1.51, 1.52, 1.54, 1.55) and to add new features or improvements.
Brazilian Style: The overall design, accessories, and customization options heavily reflect the unique “style qualificado” of Brazilian truckers.
Paid Mod: High-quality, extensively developed mods like this are almost always paid mods. This supports the creators for their time and effort in producing such detailed content.

Credits: plinio

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
